name: Daxua The Game
description:
Daxua is the alias of our protagonist. He is a talented violinist, who know how to fight with his violin bow and play music with his flute. His past is unknown. And all we know is he has debt to collect. Join him on his journey to unfold his past.

Featuring: A game where you can be an super cool violinist: losing a battle is an option but not a choice! The fate of Daxua changes with your every decision. Cinematic scenes with awesome music and effects.

Controls:

Left/ Right Arrow to move the character. 

Up Arrow to jump.

 Space to do the awesome combo.
